ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will say: 'To Allah.' Say: 'So will you not pay heed?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will say: "To God." Say: "Then why do you not bethink yourselves?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will surely say: "Allah's." Say: "Then why do you not take heed?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will quickly reply, "It belongs to God." Say, "Will you not, then, take heed?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Thereupon they will say, “To Allah”; proclaim, “Therefore why do you not ponder?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will say: "It is Allah's!" Say: "Will you not then remember"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They will say: Allah's. Say: Will you not then mind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They will say, God's.' Say: 'Will you not then remember?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They will say: Unto Allah. Say: Will ye not then remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will say, "To God." Say, "So will you not pay heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will surely say: God's. Say thou: will ye not then heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will say, ‘To Allah.’ Say, ‘Will you not then take admonition?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will say, "To Allah!" say: "Yet will ye not receive admonition?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will say: "It is Allah's!" Say: "Will you not then remember?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will say: 'To Allah' Say: 'Then will you not remember'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will say, “To God.” Say, “Will you not reflect?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:85] They will say, ‘To God’. Say, to them: ‘Will you not then remember?’ (tadhakkarūna, the second tā’ [of tatadhakkarūna] has been assimilated with the dhāl) will you [not then] be admonished and so realise that the One Who has the power to originate creation also has the power to resurrect after death?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They will say: Unto Allah. Say) to them, Muhammad: (Will ye not then remember) will you not then take heed and obey Allah?
